description.zh-CN: 自然元素视觉效果家族，包含极光、波浪、粒子、液体和烟雾五种自然现象的动态模拟。通过 CSS 动画、SVG 路径和滤镜效果实现流动、飘渺、有机的视觉体验。自然启发的视觉效果家族，采用极光、波浪和粒子效果。创造自然生物启发的沉浸体验。
description.en-US: Nature-inspired visual effects family featuring aurora, waves, particles, liquid, and smoke creating immersive and engaging digital experiences through thoughtful design principles, modern aesthetics, and user-centered approach to interface creating immersive and engaging digital experiences through thoughtful design principles, modern aesthetics, and user-centered approach to interface development Celebrates natural phenomena through visual effects Perfect for environmental applications, nature documentation, and ecological content. biophilic design principles and natural element integration. Ensures exceptional design quality through strategic principles and thoughtful implementation. Integrates natural elements promoting environmental consciousness and biophilic design principles.
